title: Condensed Cyrillic modern serif on Klucis poster from 1933
content:
Looking for an id on the type along the bottom of this poster. thank you.

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [Z8769.RaiseBannerMarxEngelsLeninStalin.1933.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20121215132839/http:/typophile.com/files/Z8769.RaiseBannerMarxEngelsLeninStalin.1933.jpg) | 94.75 KB |
author: geoffkaplan

comments.content: You may want to look amongst the condensed/compressed Bodonis with Cyrillic.
Something like [this](http://web.archive.org/web/20121215132839/http:/www.fontshop.com/fonts/singles/paratype/bodoni_condensed_cyrillic/) for example. I doubt you'll find a 100% exact match.
How about that "K" and that "C"-any suggestions?
